entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid has worse render performance than Blazor Server and WebAssembly #28667
  • Label text gets cropped when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout #28660
    Backlog
  • Recipe search result page is not showing up properly. #28659
  • I8_Headers_and_Footers-The footer "2019" is displayed in the header position #28658
  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the simulator would cause clipping on the description text. #28657
  • CollectionView CollectionViewHandler2 doesnt change ItemsLayout on DataTrigger #28656
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Preferences are cleared in debug mode android it works fine in release mode #28654
  • Loading a resource dictionary based on a condition in MAUI8 #28653

Closed

  • .NET 9 - Raise Min iOS supported version to 13.0 or 15.0 #22718
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation #28303
    .NET 9 SR6
  • TabbedPage: WinUI: Back-button persists when swapping to a Tab that does not have a NavigationPage. #14689
    .NET 9 SR6
  • FlyoutPage IsPresented not updated properly in windows #28440
    .NET 9 SR7
  • .NET Maui Blazor Hybrid App Not Working On Physical Device #28387
  • I cannot have my target framework to net9.0-android35.0 but i could only use net9.0-android . #28651
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Publish command creates an MSIX package that works locally but crashes at Microsoft Store #28114

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28674
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    community ✨
  • [Testing]Fix TappingDoneClosesKeyboard #28668
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [ci] We do want macos15 #28673
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation. #28340
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UI tests ShouldIgnoreBottomContentInsetForCollectionViewItems and VerifyCarouselViewBindingAndRendering #28626
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] [ci] Some fixes for dnceng builds #28672
  • [Windows] Fixed BackButton visibility issue when switching tabs without NavigationPage #28371
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fix IsPresented property not updating correctly in FlyoutPage #28471
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [tests] Fix ItemImageSourceShouldBeVisible #28665
    area-testing, area-controls-swipeview
  • [ci] Some fixes for dnceng builds #28671
  • Make it safer to set TestCases.HostApp main page #28355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Fixed test case failure 28485 #28644
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using swipe gesture #27186
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Provisioning: Only install specific Android API levels if requested #28650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Enhancement] Changes in navigation events parameters #28384
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-navigation
  • [Windows] Add SingleSelectionFollowsFocus Platform Specific property #28352
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix App freezes when Background property is set to OnPlatform Color DynamicResource #27444
    t/bug, area-drawing, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] SwipeView: SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored - fix #27389
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Test] Run Windows Device and UI Tests on 1ES pools #28625
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label height nested VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for TabbedPage more menu items color. #26876
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ListView.ScrollTo to Align SelectedItem with Center or End on Windows #26922
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix up net10 TODOs in PropertyMapper #28630
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] TabbedPage.AutoResizeIconsProperty #28046
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Customization of TitleBar buttons #27363
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • [iOS] - Fixed SearchBar Dimension Handling to Respect WidthRequest and HeightRequest Values #27449
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Incorrect Scrolling Behavior in CollectionView ScrollTo Method Using Index Value #27246
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #27153
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Refresh Color not applying to RefreshView initially. #28638
    community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed Shell.SearchHandler ClearPlaceholderIcon Color Issue #28601
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Catalyst] Fixed the CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28623
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28636
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
